Key Match Events: Comoros scored the only goal of the match in the 43rd minute
Ghana had several chances but failed to convert them
Pre-Game Insights: The Black Stars were hoping to win and top Group I
Comoros dominated play from the start
Post-Match Reflections: Ghana's loss put them 4th in the group standings
Substitutions and performance reflections by coach Chris Hughton
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the opener for the 2026 World Cup qualifiers
Comoros' relentless play and Ghana's unlucky chances
